label.en: FRBR - Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records

description.en: Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records namespace

frad.title: FRAD model
frad.description: This is the element set of native RDF classes and properties described in the Functional Requirements for Authority Data model. The model also uses elements previously described in the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records (FRBR) entity-relationship model.

frbrer.title: FRBRer model
frbrer.description: This is the element set of native RDF classes and properties described in the current text (Feb 2009) of the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records (FRBR) entity-relationship model.

frbroo.title: FRBRoo model
frbroo.description: Element set of the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records object-oriented extension to the the CIDOC Conceptual Reference Model (CRM)

frbsad.title: FRSAD model
frbsad.description: This is the element set of native RDF classes and properties described in the Functional Requirements for Subject Authority Data model. The model also uses elements previously described in the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records (FRBR) entity-relationship model.

frbrerusertask.title: FRBRer User Tasks
frbrerusertask.description: Based on the current text, Feb 2009.

frbrerusertask.title: FRBRer User Tasks
frbrerusertask.description: Based on the current text, Feb 2009.
